info.title: Test mpvb 5 - A guide to XPO's REST APIs
info.description:
# Introduction 
Welcome to XPO's open API explorer! Here, you have the ability to discover the possibilities that XPO has to offer through our suite of open APIs

Our APIs are built on modern REST principles, and will enable you to drive success for your organization by directly integrating information from XPO's transportation ecosystem to your own applications. 
- **Key features are:** 
 * On-demand access to real-time market rates, across multiple modes of transportation. 
 * Ability to convert rate quotes to live orders. 

In this page, you'll find the information regarding all of our available APIs, their operations, along with complete details on parameters, requests and response formats.

Are you looking for an API capability that we don't yet offer? Please reach out to us at apionboarding@xpo.com and let us know what you're looking for. We are continuously working to offer new integration capabilities for our customers and partners.

tags.name: OAuth API
tags.description: XPO Logistics uses OAuth 2.0 token mechanism to securely access API endpoints using client credentials grant type. User must get Client Id, Client Secret, Scope and API Key prior to generate bearer token either by requesting to apionboarding@xpo.com or submitting a support query Here. The diagram below illustrates the supported authorization flow.

tags.name: Quote API
tags.description: XPO's quote API provides real-time, on-demand rates for either full truckload or less than truckload shipments. The quoting API provides 24/7 on-demand access to XPO's rates, allowing you to get a price at any time.

post.description:
Generate token allows you to generate a bearer token. In order to generate the token, you will need to provide an API key in the request header parameter as well as Client ID, Client Secret, Scope and Grant Type in the payload.

 Once the token is generated, you will be able to use that token to access any of XPO's open API endpoints. The generated token will expire in 2 hours. Once expired, you will need to refresh the token in order to continue to access the API.

parameters.description: Api Key as provided by XPO.
parameters.name: x-api-key

x-code-samples.source:
curl --location --request POST 'https://api-uat-xpoconnect.xpo.com/oAuthAPI/rest/v1/token/' \

--header 'x-api-key: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' \

--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \

--data-raw '{

"client_id": "xpo-tran-boomi-test-app",

"client_secret": "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX",

"scope": "xpo-rates-api",

"grant_type": "client_credentials"

}'

404.description: Error 404 Unknown operation. Please contact XPO representative.

post.description:
Create quote accepts information about an individual shipment, and returns a rate - this is the price that XPO would charge to move that shipment. 

 In order to create a quote, you will need to provide a valid API key and token in the header parameter and shipment details in the request payload.

parameters.description: Api Key as provided by XPO.
parameters.name: x-api-key

parameters.description: Valid bearer token generated using Token API.
parameters.name: xpoauthorization
async
parameters.description: pass async=true, if asynchronous call is needed.

404.description: Error 404 Unknown operation. Please contact XPO representative.

post.description:
Convert Quote to Order allows you to take a previously created quote and place it as an active order.

 In order to convert a quote to an order, you will need to provide a valid API key and token in the header parameter, and the quote details in the request payload.

parameters.description: Api Key as provided by XPO.
parameters.name: x-api-key

parameters.description: Valid bearer token generated using Token API.
parameters.name: xpoauthorization

404.description: Error 404 Unknown operation. Please contact XPO representative.

get.description:
Allows partner to get quote details by providing MasterQuoteId.

 User must provide valid API Key and token as header parameter and {masterQuoteId} as url path parameter to get Quote details.

parameters.description: Api Key as provided by XPO.
parameters.name: x-api-key

parameters.description: Valid bearer token generated using Token API.
parameters.name: xpoauthorization

x-code-samples.source:
curl --location --request GET 'https://api-uat-xpoconnect.xpo.com/quoteAPI/rest/v1/quotes/72957' \
--header 'x-api-key: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' \
--header 'xpoauthorization: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'

404.description: Error 404 Unknown operation. Please contact XPO representative.

get.description:
Allows partner to get quote details by providing specific MasterQuoteId & QuoteId.

 User must provide valid API Key and token as header parameter and {masterQuoteId} & {quoteId} as url path parameter to get Quote details.
get.operationId: Quote by Master Quote Id & Quote Id

parameters.description: Api Key as provided by XPO.
parameters.name: x-api-key

parameters.description: Valid bearer token generated using Token API.
parameters.name: xpoauthorization

x-code-samples.source:
curl --location --request GET 'https://api-uat-xpoconnect.xpo.com/quoteAPI/rest/v1/quotes/72957/quote/0000034834' \
--header 'x-api-key: XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX' \
--header 'xpoauthorization: Bearer XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'

404.description: Error 404 Unknown operation. Please contact XPO representative.

client_id.description: Client Id as provided by XPO.

client_secret.description: Client Secret as provided by XPO.

scope.description: Scope as provided by XPO to access requested API.

grant_type.description: Grant Type, typical value is client_credentials.

partnerIdentifierCode.description: Partner identifier code used for uniquely identify the partner.

equipmentCategoryCode.description: Type of Equipment used to move your shipment, such as Dry Van, Flatbed etc.

equipmentTypeCode.description: Equipment type is the classification under equipment category, such as Dry Van 53, Dry Van 58 etc.

transportationMode.description: Mode of Transportation, accepted values are string of array as TL, LTL

additionalServices.description: Additional services required for this quote.

phoneNumbers.description: Primary and alternate numbers for communication.

isPrimary.description: Is it the primary contact information?.

referenceNumbers.description: If customer has more than one reference number e.g. primary order number , secondary order number.

applicationSource.description: Application source is an enum, which indicates this quote created by which source like API, XpoConnect, EDI etc.

cityName.description: City name belongs to stop location.

stateCode.description: State code of the stop location.

scheduledTimeFrom.description: The earliest time by which the service provider can reach the stop.

scheduledTimeTo.description: The Latest time by which the service provider can reach the stop.

stopReferenceNumbers.description: The collection of reference numbers associated with this stop, its type is same as order reference object.

sequenceNo.description: Stop sequence number, required Required only if multi stop quote request.

stops.description: Stops information for this Quote including origin and destination.
